alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Grady; Mitchell; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 3:15PM EDT until July 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Western Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Camilla to near Cairo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Thomasville, Cairo, Pelham, Camilla, Boston, Doerun, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Riverside, Schley, Funston, Barwick, Sale City, Capel, Dillon, Merrillville, Moultrie Municipal A/P and Murphy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
